subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The prospect of adding a slugger like Jason Bay and a sturdy starter appears to be more appealing to the Mets than pursuing a star like John Lackey and trading for a left fielder.
snippet: The prospect of adding a slugger like Jason Bay and a sturdy starter appears to be more appealing to the Mets than pursuing a star like John Lackey and trading for a left fielder.
